enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the fog customizer.

surface.name: Overworld
surface.description: Change the color of the fog in the Overworld.

surfaceColor.name: Overworld Color
surfaceColor.description: The color of the fog in the Overworld.

hell.name: Nether
hell.description: Change the color of the fog in the Nether.

hellColor.name: Nether Color
hellColor.description: The color of the fog in the Nether.

end.name: End
end.description: Change the color of the fog in the End.

endColor.name: End Color
endColor.description: The color of the fog in the End.

water.name: Water
water.description: Change the color of the fog inside the water.

waterColor.name: Water Color
waterColor.description: The color of the fog inside the water.

lava.name: Lava
lava.description: Change the color of the fog inside the lava.

lavaColor.name: Lava Color
lavaColor.description: The color of the fog inside the lava.

surface.name: Overworld
surface.description: Enable or disable the custom fog density in the Overworld.

surfaceDensity.name: Overworld density
surfaceDensity.description: The density percentage of the fog in the Overworld.

surfaceDistance.name: Overworld distance
surfaceDistance.description: The distance in blocks where the fog should be fully visible in the Overworld.

hell.name: Nether
hell.description: Enable or disable the custom fog density in the Nether.

hellDensity.name: Nether density
hellDensity.description: The density percentage of the fog in the Nether.

hellDistance.name: Nether distance
hellDistance.description: The distance in blocks where the fog should be fully visible in the Nether.

end.name: End
end.description: Enable or disable the custom fog density in the End.

endDensity.name: End density
endDensity.description: The density percentage of the fog in the End.

endDistance.name: End distance
endDistance.description: The distance in blocks where the fog should be fully visible in the End.
